current_trigger(?Trigger)

Succeeds if Trigger is a currently defined symbolic trigger.
Trigger
An atom or variable.

Calling Modes

  • current_trigger(++)
  • current_trigger(-)

Description

Succeeds if Trigger is a currently defined symbolic trigger for suspensions (see trigger/1). If Trigger is a variable, the current triggers will be enumerated one by one via backtracking.

Fail Conditions

Trigger is not a current trigger.

Resatisfiable

yes
